ComicInfo.Title: A Better Mousetrap
ComicInfo.Summary: In the sewers deep beneath New York's bustling sidewalks April O'Neil finds herself face-to-face with Baxter Stockman's malevolent mechanical mousers. The young computer programmer needs help of the kind only a quartet of Ninja Turtles can provide!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 17:52:08. [CVDB232772]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Matt Moylan, Rob Ruffolo, Shaun Curtis
ComicInfo.Characters: April O'Neil, Baxter Stockman, Ch'rell, Donatello, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Mouser, Raphael
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: Erik Sander (inker), LeSean Thomas (penciler), Matt Moylan Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Dreamwave 73e365f5b4a01826d153a177f34025c Anna’s Archive
